title: Israel’s government wants to pull the plug on its own military radio
summary_full: Galatz, which broadcasts revelatory reporting and wide-ranging talk, is one of Israel’s most popular stations. Critics see a broader effort to silence dissent.
summary_public: Galatz, which broadcasts revelatory reporting and wide-ranging talk, is one of Israel’s most popular stations. Critics see a broader effort to silence dissent.

IL.label: negative
IL.evidence: Critics see a broader effort to silence dissent.
